ygData.subject: Re: under water casting
ygData.msgSnippet: You ve got a good idea with the gate thing... I m a lvl 12 Wizard and of course Gate is one of my most used spells. I have *never* seen the message about gate
ygData.messageBody:
You've got a good idea with the gate thing... I'm a lvl 12 Wizard and of
course Gate is one of my most used spells. I have *never* seen the message
about gate collapse, but then I always bind myself in an out-of-the-way
spot, so you may be on to something.

Xorgan
Veeshan

-----Original Message-----
From: yur@... [mailto:yur@...]
Sent: Friday, June 04, 1999 2:47 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] under water casting


From: yur@...



I have zoned from Qeynos South to Erud's Crossing by swimming. you can zone
while swimming. i swam all the way from Qeynos to Erud's isle. and i
teleported
many times underwater without problem. i think the gate collapse only
happens
when someone is STANDING on your gate position. because the gate collapse
happen to me only 4 times and those 4 times happen ALL together within a
period
of 1 min. where all my gate just either fail or collapse. but after i
waited
awhile, it worked fine.
